pageContext.claim: “Did you notice that everybody is saying Merry Christmas again? Did you notice? Saying Merry Christmas.”
pageContext.analysis: This claim is a Trump favorite and also popular on Fox News and in right-wing media, but the evidence of a “War on Christmas” is flimsy and unconvincing. The phrase “Merry Christmas” continues to be popular in retail advertisements, popular culture and public spaces despite the use of more secular holiday greetings. There’s no evidence anything has changed under Trump.
